note.p: Birth: Rushmere, near Ipswich, Suffolk, England (11 September 1831)
Education: Glasgow University. BA (1856), MA (1857); DCL

Career: School teacher; Professor of Mathematics, King's College, Windsor, Nova Scotia (1859-1864); Professor of Natural Philosophy, Queen's College, Belfast (1867-1897); Secretary, British Association Committee on Underground Temperature; died of heart disease
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1905 vol 75 pp 377-380 signed by J P
